subject: Football
Cheating
lead_paragraph: The Patriots have been tight-lipped over the N.F.L.’s inquiry into their use of underinflated footballs, but there are plenty of experts with extensive knowledge of inflation and deflation.
snippet: The Patriots have been tight-lipped over the N.F.L.’s inquiry into their use of underinflated footballs, but there are plenty of experts with extensive knowledge of inflation and deflation.
